Hi Folks

Just the one offer this time it is exclusive to VPSBoard so I hope it is well received.

Package:

  • LOCATION: Coresite Miami, Florida, USA
  • CPU Cores: 6 cores equal share (E5-2620)
  • RAM: 4GB
  • SWAP: 4GB
  • HDD: 100 GB (8 disk Raid 10 array)
  • Bandwidth: 2TB @ gbit
  • 1 x IPv4
  • 5 x IPv6

Price: €10.00 p/month with coupon code: vpsboard4gb

Order Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=78

Thanks for reading if anyone would like any custom quotes for a VPS in Miami please feel free to ask, I can do anything from 1GB Ram up to 32GB RAM on Xen so it is 100% dedicated and pre allocated.

Anthony.
